description: A dashboard for visualizing results from the k6.io load testing tool, using the InfluxDB exporter

targets.query: SELECT count("value"), mean("value"), min("value"), max("value"), percentile("value", 90) AS "p90", percentile("value", 95) AS "p95" FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("error_code" !~ /.+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "method"
SELECT count("value") / 60 FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("error_code" =~ /.+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND ("error_code" !~ /.+/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT median("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND ("error_code" !~ /.+/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND ("error_code" !~ /.+/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND ("error_code" !~ /.+/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

title: k6 Load Testing Results
